Name: add-student
Description: Adds a new student to the school

Name: add-grade
Description: Adds a new course grade for the given student

Name: add-course
Description: Adds a new course to the school for the given semester, with the count of the lectures and exercises, and the teacher's name.

Name: get-grades
Description: Gets the grades for the specified student

Name: get-semester-stats
Description: Gets the semester statistics for the given student

Name: get-students
Description: Gets a list of all students

Name: add-grades-bulk
Description: This command adds grades to a student for multiple courses. If the student or a course does not exist, one will be created.
Example:
add-grades-bulk: Ivan Petrov
1, OP, 25, 30, prof. I.Ivanov, 6; 1, LAAG, 25, 30, prof. G.Panayotova, 4; 1, DM, 25, 30, prof. R.Pavlov, 3; 2, OOP, 25, 30, prof. I.Ivanov, 4; 3, KMK, 25, 30, V.Ivanov, 5
